The interim partogram 
• The interim partogram accommodates both the latent and the active phase of labour. All observations should 
be planned as per intervals recommended above and recorded on the partogram and signed off by the 
healthcare worker. 
• Latent phase: there are 12 blocks, 2 hours each, for 24-hour monitoring.
